00011       InputManager::~InputManager( )
00012       {
00013             if( mKeyboard ) {
00014                   mInputManager->destroyInputObject( mKeyboard );
00015                   mKeyboard = 0;
00016             }
00017             if( mMouse ) {
00018                   mInputManager->destroyInputObject( mMouse );
00019                   mMouse = 0;
00020             }
00021             if( mInputManager ) {
00022                   OIS::InputManager::destroyInputSystem( mInputManager );
00023                   mInputManager = 0;
00024             }
00025       };

00027       bool InputManager::Init( HWND hwnd, int width, int height )
00028       {
00029             OIS::ParamList pl;
00030 
00031             //:: Get stringed wnd handle
00032             std::ostringstream wnd;
00033             wnd << (size_t)hwnd;
00034 
00035             //:: Set up initialization params
00036             pl.insert( std::make_pair( std::string( "WINDOW" ), wnd.str( ) ) );
00037             pl.insert( std::make_pair( std::string( "w32_mouse" ), std::string( "DISCL_FOREGROUND" ) ) );
00038             pl.insert( std::make_pair( std::string( "w32_mouse" ), std::string( "DISCL_NONEXCLUSIVE" ) ) );
00039 
00040             //:: Create input manager
00041             mInputManager = OIS::InputManager::createInputSystem( pl );
00042             if( mInputManager == 0 )
00043             {
00044                   HLOGERR( "Failed to initialize input system" );
00045                   return false;
00046             }
00047             mInputManager->enableAddOnFactory( OIS::InputManager::AddOn_All );
00048 
00049             //:: Create keyboard device
00050             mKeyboard = (OIS::Keyboard*)mInputManager->createInputObject( OIS::OISKeyboard, true );
00051             if( mKeyboard == 0 )
00052             {
00053                   HLOGERR( "Failed to initialize keyboard input" );
00054                   return false;
00055             }
00056             mKeyboard->setEventCallback( this );
00057 
00058             //:: Create mouse device
00059             mMouse = (OIS::Mouse*)mInputManager->createInputObject( OIS::OISMouse, true );
00060             if( mMouse == 0 )
00061             {
00062                   HLOGERR( "Failed to initialize mouse input" );
00063                   return false;
00064             }
00065             mMouse->setEventCallback( this );
00066 
00067             const OIS::MouseState& ms = mMouse->getMouseState( );
00068             ms.width = width;
00069             ms.height = height;
00070 
00071             return true;
00072       };
00073 
00074       bool InputManager::Poll( )
00075       {
00076             mMouse->capture( );
00077             mKeyboard->capture( );
00078             return true;
00079       };

00081       bool InputManager::GetKeyDown( int keycode )
00082       {
00083             return mKeyboard->isKeyDown( (OIS::KeyCode)keycode );
00084       };

00086       Halia::Point InputManager::GetAbsMousePos( )
00087       {
00088             const OIS::MouseState& ms = mMouse->getMouseState( );

00118       bool InputManager::keyPressed( const OIS::KeyEvent& arg )
00119       {
00120             if( arg.key == OIS::KC_LSHIFT || arg.key == OIS::KC_RSHIFT ) {
00121                   mModifiers |= 0x0001;
00122                   return true;
00123             }
00124             if( arg.key == OIS::KC_LCONTROL || arg.key == OIS::KC_RCONTROL ) {
00125                   mModifiers |= 0x0002;
00126                   return true;
00127             }
00128 
00129             KeyEvent evt( EventType::KEYDOWN, this, (KeyCode::KeyCode)arg.key );
00130             DispatchEvent( &evt );
00131 
00132             return true;
00133       }
00134 
00135       bool InputManager::keyReleased( const OIS::KeyEvent& arg )
00136       { 
00137             if( arg.key == OIS::KC_LSHIFT || arg.key == OIS::KC_RSHIFT ) {
00138                   mModifiers &= ~0x0001;
00139                   return true;
00140             }
00141             if( arg.key == OIS::KC_LCONTROL || arg.key == OIS::KC_RCONTROL ) {
00142                   mModifiers &= ~0x0002;
00143                   return true;
00144             }
00145 
00146             KeyEvent evt( EventType::KEYUP, this, (KeyCode::KeyCode)arg.key );
00147             DispatchEvent( &evt );
00148 
00149             return true;
00150       }
00151 
00152       bool InputManager::mouseMoved( const OIS::MouseEvent& arg )
00153       {
00154             PosEvent evt( EventType::MOUSEMOVE, this, Vector3( (float)arg.state.X.abs, (float)arg.state.Y.abs, 1.0f ) );
00155             DispatchEvent( &evt );
00156 
00157             return true;
00158       }

00165             return true;
